Our diverse menu reflects a variety of tastes, and our handcrafted drinks are designed to perfectly complement your meal. For any questions or to make a reservation , please get in touch with us. Giselle Miami - Rooftop bar in Miami | The Rooftop Guide Rooftop Bars Europe North America Central America & Caribbean South America Asia Middle East Oceania Africa Rooftop Pools Inspiration Sign up North America Rooftop bars in Miami Miami rooftop bar Giselle Miami $ $ $ $ $ 3rd floor Downtown Images belong to the bar Last updated: January 28, 2025 Giselle Miami Rooftop Bar Miami Dowmtown Miami Fusion Year round No Overview Eclectic, edgy, and extravagant rooftop restaurant and bar in downtown Miami. Found in the heart of the Arts & Entertainment District of downtown Miami, Giselle is a modern and swanky rooftop restaurant and lounge, ready to offer a hot and elevated experience out of the ordinary. Situated above the famous 24/7 party-spot E11even, there is a private elevator taking you straight up to the more sophisticated Giselle rooftop. Here you find a beautiful and exquisite indoor-outdoor setting, featuring a fully retractable roof, a 14-seat marble-adorned bar, stylish dining tables and comfy lounge spots, all overlooking the Miami skyline. The rooftop menu includes Asian, Mediterranean & French-inspired cuisine created by chef Gustavo Zuluaga, complemented with a fine selection of wines and an elevated cocktail programming. Try the 'Head Over Heels', made with E11EVEN Vodka, Sparkling RosÃ© Raspberry, lemongrass & citrus. Sophisticated yet eclectic, seductively captivating, edgy, and extravagant, Giselle rooftop is Miami's new hot spot for amazing vibes, unique drinks and spectacular food. Watch Location & Map 15 NE 11th St, Miami, FL 33132 Contact +1 305-358-9848 info@gisellemiami.com Visit website Facebook Instagram Opening Hours Monday: Closed Tuesday: Closed Wednesday: 18.00 - 03.00 Thursday: 18.00 - 03.00 Friday: 18.00 - 03.00 Saturday: 18.00 - 03.00 Sunday: 18.00 - 03.00 FAQ What is the Giselle Miami dress code? The Giselle Miami dress code is upscale and stylish. No oversized clothing, including but not limited to t-shirts and pants. Beachwear, tank tops, shorts, baseball caps, flip-flops & sports jerseys are not allowed. What food does Giselle Miami serve? Giselle Miami serves Asian, Mediterranean & French-inspired cuisine. Rating By: Rikard Fredricson Rikard has spent the last 10 years exploring, enjoying, researching and working with rooftop venues. During these years he has visited more than 700 rooftops across the globe. The experience he has gained is used to create helpful, in-depth and accessible content, and to share his knowledge and rooftop expertise with fellow rooftop-lovers.
